s l wrote:
> 
> C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin>java -version

So you do have java on your machine, but it would appear the directory
you had to navigate to to run it is not in your PATH.

If you navigate back to your "junit tryout" directory and you amend your
command (watch the line wrap) to :-


C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java -cp junit.jar
junit.swingui.TestRunner

At least then java will be invoked and you can move on to your next problem.

-- 
Mark
